snippet: Whiteside, once a little-known defensive specialist, is having the type of season that should put to rest the notion that last season was a fluke.
abstract: Keeping Score column; Miami Heat defensive specialist Hassan Whiteside seems to have cleared up any question about whether he is one-season wonder or on cusp of great career; eleven games into second season with Heat, Whiteside is leading NBA in blocks per game and is second in field-goal percentage.
lead_paragraph: Whiteside, once a little-known defensive specialist, is having the type of season that should put to rest the notion that last season was a fluke.

headline.print_headline: Miami Center Proves His Value While Playing at a Bargain Price
headline.main: Heat’s Hassan Whiteside Proves Value While Playing at Bargain Price
